User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the EdTech platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

registrationDate.description: Date and time the user registered.

nilePoints.description: Gamification points earned by the user.

goal.description: The primary learning goal of the user (e.g., 'social', 'business').

level.description: The self-assessed skill level of the user (e.g., 'beginner', 'intermediate').

badges.description: A list of badge names the user has earned.

Course.title: Course
Course.description: Represents a course offered on the EdTech platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Course entity.

Lesson.title: Lesson
Lesson.description: Represents a lesson within a course.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Lesson entity.

content.description: Content of the lesson (e.g., text, video URL).

order.description: The order of the lesson in the course.

Quiz.title: Quiz
Quiz.description: Represents a quiz within a course.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Quiz entity.

questions.description: List of question ids related to the quiz.

Question.title: Question
Question.description: Represents a question within a quiz.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Question entity.

options.description: Available answer options for the question.

correctAnswer.description: The correct answer to the question.

Assignment.title: Assignment
Assignment.description: Represents an assignment within a course.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Assignment entity.

dueDate.description: Due date and time for the assignment.

Progress.title: Progress
Progress.description: Represents a students progress in a course.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Progress entity.

completedLessons.description: List of lesson IDs that the user has completed.

currentLessonId.description: The ID of the next lesson the user should take.

Instructor.title: Instructor
Instructor.description: Represents an instructor who creates and manages courses.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Instructor entity.

photo.description: URL to the teacher's profile picture.

introVideo.description: URL to the teacher's introductory video.

shortBio.description: A short biography of the teacher.

availability.description: A text description of the teacher's available days and hours.

lessonPrice.description: The price for a single lesson.

bookingLink.description: An external link for booking (e.g., Gumroad, Calendly).

character.description: An emoji or character symbol representing the instructor.

subject.description: The main subject the instructor teaches.

status.description: The current status of the instructor.

averageRating.description: The instructor's average rating from student reviews.

totalReviews.description: The total number of reviews the instructor has received.

ChatMessage.title: ChatMessage
ChatMessage.description: Represents a private chat message between two users.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ChatMessage entity.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the message was sent.

CommunityMessage.title: CommunityMessage
CommunityMessage.description: Represents a public message in a community chat room.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CommunityMessage entity.

senderId.description: The UID of the user who sent the message.

senderAlias.description: The alias of the user at the time of sending.

timestamp.description: Server timestamp of when the message was sent.

AIInteraction.title: AIInteraction
AIInteraction.description: Represents an interaction with the AI tutoring assistant.

id.description: Unique identifier for the AIInteraction entity.

question.description: The question asked to the AI assistant.

courseId.description: Reference to the Course. (Relationship: Course 1:N AIInteraction). Optional as could be a general question.

Purchase.title: Purchase
Purchase.description: Represents a purchase of a product within the EdTech platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Purchase entity.

productId.description: Identifier for the product purchased. This could reference a Course or other digital asset.

productName.description: Denormalized name of the product for display purposes.

purchaseDate.description: Date and time of the purchase.

price.description: Price of the product at the time of purchase.

isGift.description: Indicates if the purchase is a gift for another user.

recipientEmail.description: The email address of the gift recipient.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a digital product available for purchase in the store.

description.description: A short description of the product.

icon.description: Lucide icon name to represent the product (e.g., 'ScrollText', 'Ankh').

Review.title: Review
Review.description: Represents a student's review of an instructor.

instructorId.description: The ID of the instructor being reviewed.

studentId.description: The ID of the student who wrote the review.

rating.description: The rating given by the student, typically from 1 to 5.

comment.description: The text content of the review.

date.description: The date the review was submitted.
